item.description: Reverence for Life will be hosting a Vegan Potluck Dinner at First Parish UU Church in Concord, MA.    All are welcome, including children!  We will have a mural coloring activity for the kids!     We ask that you bring a dish that is meat, fish, dairy and egg free.  We also ask that you bring your own plate, glass, silverware and napkins to reduce paper waste and clean-up.  If you don't like to cook, or don't have a recipe, just bring a salad or some crusty bread.  There will be plenty of food for all!  Bring your own wine, beer or beverage.
item.name: Vegan Potluck Dinner at First Parish UU Church in Concord, MA
